document.full_text: the discovery this week of 72 bodies dumped in mass graves in a no-man's-land south of the u.s. border has rattled mexican authorities and families alike.
document.title: mass graves raise concerns about brazen gangs kidnapping mexican migrants
lines_and_colors: the discovery this week of 72 bodies dumped in mass graves in a no-man's-land south of the u.s. border has rattled mexican authorities and families alike.
